Public NotInheritable Class OutAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class OutAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示数据应从被调用方封送回调用方。

span.span: Indicates that data should be marshaled from callee back to caller.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此属性应用于参数。You can apply this attribute to parameters. 是可选的。The is optional. COM 互操作支持的属性和平台调用才。The attribute is supported for COM interop and platform invoke only. 在没有显式设置的情况下，互操作封送处理程序假定规则基于参数类型、 是否通过引用或值，通过传递的参数和类型是否是本机结构中或非本机结构。In the absence of explicit settings, the interop marshaler assumes rules based on the parameter type, whether the parameter is passed by reference or by value, and whether the type is blittable or non-blittable. 例如，类始终被假定为 In/Out 和假定一个通过值传递的字符串数组中。For example, the class is always assumed to be In/Out and an array of strings passed by value is assumed to be In. 仅限扩展的行为不默认封送处理行为的参数。Out-only behavior is never a default marshaling behavior for parameters. 你可以将应用通过引用将 In/Out 行为更改为仅限扩展的行为，相当于使用传递的值和引用类型到`out`C# 中的关键字。You can apply the to value and reference types passed by reference to change In/Out behavior to Out-only behavior, which is equivalent to using the `out` keyword in C#. 例如，为只扩展，则可以更改通过值传递，默认情况下，作为在只读参数封送的数组。For example, arrays passed by value, marshaled as In-only parameters by default, can be changed to Out-only. 但是，该行为不始终提供预期的语义时的类型包括所有本机结构中元素或字段，因为互操作封送处理程序使用固定。However, the behavior does not always provide expected semantics when the types include all-blittable elements or fields because the interop marshaler uses pinning. 如果你不关心将数据传入到被调用方，对外封送处理可以提供更好的性能非通用类型。If you do not care about passing data into the callee, Out-only marshaling can provide better performance for non-blittable types. 组合和是特别有用时应用于数组和格式化，非通用类型。Combining the and is particularly useful when applied to arrays and formatted, non-blittable types. 调用方查看被调用方对这些类型仅在应用这两个属性时所做的更改。Callers see the changes a callee makes to these types only when you apply both attributes. 由于这些类型需要复制封送处理期间，你可以使用和以减少不必要的副本。Since these types require copying during marshaling, you can use and to reduce unnecessary copies. 有关详细信息的效果封送处理行为，请参阅[方向特性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/241ac5b5-928e-4969-8f58-1dbc048f9ea2)。For more information on the effect of on marshaling behavior, see [Directional Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/241ac5b5-928e-4969-8f58-1dbc048f9ea2). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将应用和平台调用来调用作为参数传递一个数组的原型。The following example shows how to apply the and to a platform invoke prototype that passes an array as a parameter. 方向特性的组合允许调用方以查看被调用方所做的更改。The combination of directional attributes allows the caller to see the changes made by the callee. [!code-cpp[Interop InOutParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Interop InOutParameters/CPP/inout.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Interop InOutParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Interop InOutParameters/CS/inout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Interop InOutParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Interop InOutParameters/VB/inout.vb#1)]
